Class AbstractClient

java.lang.Object
info.kgeorgiy.ja.dunaev.hello.AbstractClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
HelloClient
Direct Known Subclasses:
HelloUDPClient, HelloUDPNonblockingClient
public abstract class AbstractClient extends Object implements HelloClient
Abstract class representing UDP client.
Author:
Dunaev Kirill
